title: somone hack me and he change my email HELP!!!
body: how i can recovering my ac%%%%

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help!  Just reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team can investigate your specific issue.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
